item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, November 30, 2024 at 11:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Geometric line-art of Wacław Szpakowski (2017) (155 points | 18 comments)
2. Engineering Sleep (137 points | 45 comments)
3. Nodezator is a generalist Python node editor (75 points | 11 comments)
4. Breaking the 4Chan CAPTCHA (363 points | 182 comments)
5. Archaeometallurgical investigation of the Nebra Sky Disc (33 points | 3 comments)
6. Cause of rare devastating, autoimmune disease in Puerto Ricans–and possible cure (37 points | discuss)
7. Long Fatigue: The exhaustion that lingers after an infection (61 points | 33 comments)
8. Making Screenshots of Test Equipment Old and New (23 points | 4 comments)
9. Samurai: Adapting Segment Anything Model for Zero-Shot Visual Tracking (19 points | 2 comments)
10. Apollo Operations Handbook [pdf] (24 points | 1 comment)
11. The Revised SI of physical units (2019), Max Planck (1900), and 'Planck scale' (19 points | 2 comments)
12. Lessons from 15 Years of Indie App Development (100 points | 32 comments)
13. The Influence of Bell Labs (152 points | 84 comments)
14. Understanding SIMD: Infinite complexity of trivial problems (174 points | 74 comments)
15. Everything You Never Wanted to Know About Linker Script (2021) (52 points | 9 comments)
16. Both KDE and GNOME to offer official distros (13 points | discuss)
17. Neomacs: Structural Lisp IDE/browser/computing environment (53 points | 14 comments)

19. Calculating the largest known prime in Ruby (12 points | 1 comment)
20. The Hall SC-VGA-2 Video Processor, the Atari ST and NeXTSTEP (50 points | 8 comments)

22. Transposing Tensor Files (6 points | 1 comment)
23. Show HN: It took me 5() months to build a Plausible alternative (34 points | 38 comments)
24. NASA's Europa Clipper: Miles Down, Instruments Deploying (91 points | 30 comments)
25. Core copyright violation moves ahead in The Intercept's lawsuit against OpenAI (235 points | 227 comments)
26. Engineers do not get to make startup mistakes when they build ledgers (486 points | 461 comments)
27. Perhaps acquiring Pixelmator is about competing with Creative Cloud (85 points | 60 comments)
28. Kitagawa Utamaro Japanese Painter (11 points | discuss)
29. Mirror, Mirror on the Wall, What Is the Best Topology of Them All? (64 points | 5 comments)
